EmailTemplate.subject: We are switching our telephone provider
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear valued customer, We are writing to let you know that we are switching our toll-free telephone provider. This is expected to occur in mid-July. While we are taking every measure to have a smooth transition, as with any technology conversion there is a possibility that an outage may occur during this change. If at any time you are unable to connect with the NCR support team via the toll-free number, please use the alternative number provided below to connect with us for your support needs. Toll-free number Alternate number  800-836-3796 315-472-4531 We will notify you once the switch is complete.
